text: The London School for Performing Arts & Technology, more commonly known as The BRIT School for Performing Arts & Technology, is a school in Croydon, London, England. It opened in 1991. It is the only free performing arts school in the United Kingdom. OFSTED rated it as 'outstanding'. ==Notable past students== *Amy Winehouse *Adele *Jessie J *Imogen Heap *Kate Nash *Leona Lewis *The Kooks *Rizzle Kicks *Tom Holland Category:1991 establishments in England Category:Buildings and structures in the London Borough of Croydon Category:Performing arts Category:Schools in London
title: BRIT School
